author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 27-year-old man was fatally knocked down by a train between Tiruchi and Kumaramangalam railway stations in the Tiruchi-Pudukottai broad gauge section on Tuesday.

The Government Railway Police gave the name of the victim as G. Varadhan (27) of Mudaliarpet in Puducherry.

According to railway police, Varadhan had problems with his wife and the couple were separated.

The sources said Varadhan reportedly had a tiff with his mother.
title: Man commits suicide near Tiruchi
